markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs=""
>
[Spangled Rider's Suit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=591)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Armor** [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This _+1 resilient [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_ is adorned with colorful sequins that sparkle in even the faintest light. While wearing the spangled rider’s suit, you gain a +2 item bonus to [Command an Animal](/Actions.aspx?ID=58) you are riding. Any animal you ride automatically knows the [Drop Prone](/Actions.aspx?ID=78) and [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=87) basic actions, in addition to any other basic actions it knows (normally only Leap, Seek, Stand, Stride, and Strike).

<document level="2" id="action-373" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spangled Rider's Suit
